description: Detects the image load of Python Core indicative of a Python script bundled with Py2Exe.
false_positives: Known false positive caused with Python Anaconda
name: Python Py2Exe Image Load
query: (winlog.event_data.Description:"Python\ Core" AND (NOT (process.executable.text:*Python* OR process.executable.text:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\* OR C\:\\ProgramData\\Anaconda3\\*))))
author: Patrick St. John
OTR (Open Threat Research)
